SELECT WING_MESSAGE.MESSAGE_ID , WING_MESSAGE.MESSAGE , WING_MESSAGE.SEND_FLAG , WING_MESSAGE.VESSEL_ID , WING_MESSAGE.DATA_NO , WING_MESSAGE.USER_KEY , WING_MESSAGE.RENEW_DATE , WING_MESSAGE.RENEW_USER_ID , WING_MESSAGE.TS , WING_MESSAGE.DELETE_FLAG
FROM WING_MESSAGE
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0
ORDER BY RENEW_DATE DESC
